steps.title: Take a vessel and add 1 teaspoon cumin seeds to it.
steps.content: Take a vessel and add 1 teaspoon cumin seeds to it.

steps.title: Heat it a little on low flame for about 5 seconds.
steps.content: Heat it a little on low flame for about 5 seconds.

steps.title: Pour 250 ml drinking water into it and let it boil.
steps.content: Pour 250 ml drinking water into it and let it boil.

steps.title: After boiling, let it be covered and untouched for about 5 minutes.
steps.content: After boiling, let it be covered and untouched for about 5 minutes. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Strain it into your teacup and enjoy it warm.
steps.content: Strain it into your teacup and enjoy it warm.

steps.title: According to your taste you can add honey or a pinch of salt into it.
steps.content: According to your taste you can add honey or a pinch of salt into it.
